description: The original Godzilla. The R32 GT-R dominated Australian touring cars so thoroughly they changed the rules to ban it. Its ATTESA E-TS all-wheel drive and RB26DETT twin-turbo inline-six were decades ahead of the competition.
lore: They called it Godzilla because it destroyed everything in its path. The R32 GT-R won 29 consecutive races in Group A touring cars before the sanctioning body gave up and rewrote the rulebook. Thirty years later, it still feels like the future.
